reqs:
Pre-reqs: MICB 306.
This class will be held in the Life Sciences Centre (LSC), room 1410 (effective May 16, 2016). Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
MBIM majors, MBIM honours and BIOT honours only, others consult dept.
description: Presentations, library research, paper reviews, class discussions about current research in virology. Topics such as molecular targets in viral therapy; chronic viral infection; virus-host cell interaction.
